moves.1. d4 Nf6 2. Bf4 g6 3. Nf3 Bg7 4. c3 O-O: Black is preparing for E5, with E4 a possibility
moves.6. e4 Bg4 7. h3: Chase the bishop and create a space for my black squared bishop too
moves.7... Bxf3 8. Qxf3 Nbd7 9. Bd3: I am thinking of castling long and trying to smash my way through on the king side
moves.9... Nh5 10. Bg5 h6 11. Be3: g pawn is not as strong now
moves.14... b5 15. g5 hxg5 16. hxg5 Nh5: Sacrifice time, I think I can really cause some problems along that open file
moves.17. Rxh5 gxh5 18. Qxh5 Re8: Black needs to find an escape square for the king
moves.20... Ke7 21. Nh4: There are a few traps here,
moves.22. Nf5+: The bishop is going to fall
